message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is significantly higher. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11,000. Can we meet at that price?
